short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to NodeJS Version of TiddlyWiki or TidGi APP, to Clip/Bookmark webpage, and Search your wiki from address bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clip the web content, and save to your NodeJS Tiddlywiki / TidGi App. You can also save images you want, or leave them as image link to save space. Make sure to visit website to see detailed usage and FAQ!
